1.2.3.name: wordpress/mibbit-webchat
1.2.3.description: Mibbit is an online chat client. Mibbit supports a variety of Platforms including the main PC browsers, the wii, Nokia N800, iPhone, and probably a lot more. It does this without any plugins. Just javascript. Mibbit currently supports IRC and Twitter, with other protocols due to be supported soon. You can also use the Mibbit widget to provide real time chat on your own website.
